channel.title: Serendipitous Oulipo Haiku
channel.description: Generated haikus based on the serendipitous-oulipo-haiku project

item.title: when is it, you ask
item.description:
when is it, you ask
vector fields of stick and cloth
trailing a mother

item.title: sometimes you just run
item.description:
sometimes you just run
lift into the sky above
at your ocean’s edge

item.title: lofty sequoia
item.description:
lofty sequoia
release the grip that it has
of what surrounds you

item.title: vestiges of trees
item.description:
vestiges of trees
we may spring forth foliage
listening to birds

item.title: you are potential
item.description:
you are potential
perfect, beautiful flowers
cobbles at high tide

item.title: and when you suffer
item.description:
and when you suffer
that you store your quietness
is there really up?

item.title: this hug was intense
item.description:
this hug was intense
seize those moments that make you
ruffles in our time

item.title: beauty in my mind
item.description:
beauty in my mind
for the hidden forest doors
as the darkness came

item.title: repose beneath sky
item.description:
repose beneath sky
of flight above all of it
the awe of it all

item.title: I am condensate
item.description:
I am condensate
will still have footsteps of light
of branches and roots

item.title: in just one moment
item.description:
in just one moment
together like wolves that howl
ready to unfurl

item.title: the base of thirteen
item.description:
the base of thirteen
reflecting from this good earth
into me, not me

item.title: we all can transform
item.description:
we all can transform
turbulence with breath, movement
remember the sky

item.title: oh, yes, this is it!
item.description:
oh, yes, this is it!
may bring forth fruits beyond us
a precious orchid

item.title: black, soft, powder stick
item.description:
black, soft, powder stick
chaotic origami
parametric us

item.title: a forest burned shows
item.description:
a forest burned shows
the raw transforms to beauty
of branches and roots

item.title: when you turn in a
item.description:
when you turn in a
so you can hear the whispers
of this universe

item.title: in my cup, coffee
item.description:
in my cup, coffee
brings us through our existence
astonishing — bloom

item.title: strands of life do hang
item.description:
strands of life do hang
lead you to this perspective
beneath your breath — “spring”

item.title: three-hundred-sixty
item.description:
three-hundred-sixty
dancing in erratic flight
earth and sky as one

item.title: your presence brings joy
item.description:
your presence brings joy
float away on gentle breeze
as pink fades to night

item.title: sunlight in canyons
item.description:
sunlight in canyons
are now weeks past their season
it is my function

item.title: there are these comets
item.description:
there are these comets
float away on gentle breeze
to dwell within me

item.title: oh my bald cypress
item.description:
oh my bald cypress
moments learning the flowers
heaven and the Earth

item.title: faint little circle
item.description:
faint little circle
you can be a single point
you just have to look

item.title: when you turn in a
item.description:
when you turn in a
lift into the sky above
manifest eddies

item.title: wind gusts bending trees
item.description:
wind gusts bending trees
below the grasses of thought
graphs of my being

item.title: sunlight in canyons
item.description:
sunlight in canyons
are but loops in the garment
a painted earful

item.title: hoya of Nana
item.description:
hoya of Nana
of flight above all of it
contrast is but life

item.title: I saw the sunrise
item.description:
I saw the sunrise
vibrato pierces the morn
calling you to dance

item.title: maybe all our days
item.description:
maybe all our days
that draw you in; and call you
thoughts wrapped around me

item.title: beauty in my mind
item.description:
beauty in my mind
to sit and watch little swifts
centuries of flow

item.title: you turn towards the light
item.description:
you turn towards the light
are now weeks past their season
while reflecting sky

item.title: when you submerge, keep
item.description:
when you submerge, keep
the same and yet different
earth and sky as one

item.title: there are these comets
item.description:
there are these comets
infinite, ever-changing
from a hidden world

item.title: could this day just be
item.description:
could this day just be
completely immerse yourself
lingers deep inside

item.title: a tender wave wafts
item.description:
a tender wave wafts
center on infinity
completing a proof

item.title: three generations
item.description:
three generations
little hummingbirds come, go.
modest are the trees

item.title: I stumbled upon
item.description:
I stumbled upon
plant me beside, beneath one
and staying aligned

item.title: I am condensate
item.description:
I am condensate
of moss, earth, stream, trees, and life
pareidolia

item.title: I know, even though
item.description:
I know, even though
I thought you might sit with me
in awe we exist

item.title: shadows stretch across
item.description:
shadows stretch across
gossamer laced water beads
and breath in this life

item.title: my luck dragon came
item.description:
my luck dragon came
blow through me and around me
of growth beneath soil

item.title: you gather to speak
item.description:
you gather to speak
I thought you might sit with me
bring us forth those pearls

item.title: I dream that you kiss
item.description:
I dream that you kiss
together like wolves that howl
into reminders

item.title: we all can transform
item.description:
we all can transform
like the sound of waves pulling
of my consciousness

item.title: I see you peeking
item.description:
I see you peeking
come and sit with me; this day
paths, trails of wonder

item.title: slough of quietude
item.description:
slough of quietude
shall we prance along this path
as the last leaves fall

item.title: and when you suffer
item.description:
and when you suffer
center on infinity
watch me; smile at me

item.title: abundance flowing
item.description:
abundance flowing
the air that circles the earth
of branches and roots

item.title: cedar waxwings flock
item.description:
cedar waxwings flock
half buried in sand ripples
at your ocean’s edge

item.title: as a treehugger
item.description:
as a treehugger
and find they are but water
to this small flower

item.title: your path can be framed
item.description:
your path can be framed
so they could all see this bird
and breath in this life

item.title: little hummingbird
item.description:
little hummingbird
like it is the very last
a nurturing act

item.title: so many curves here
item.description:
so many curves here
in your autumn glow, right now
like a point in space

item.title: non-linear time
item.description:
non-linear time
lets us forget what it is
the ones that I see

item.title: fire’s fingers dance,
item.description:
fire’s fingers dance,
maybe all flowers do this
focus of this path

item.title: there are these night skies
item.description:
there are these night skies
to the heights that you take wing
now, take in more light

item.title: I was on my run
item.description:
I was on my run
dancing in erratic flight
to keep it secure

item.title: an aperture formed
item.description:
an aperture formed
rupture with flight and chorus
evolve into art

item.title: great white fawn lily
item.description:
great white fawn lily
with the magnitude of life
are we not of space?

item.title: trees dip their big toes
item.description:
trees dip their big toes
reach with your iterations
of life around you

item.title: separate you stand
item.description:
separate you stand
another bloom; another
of the kale flowers

item.title: you are a symbol
item.description:
you are a symbol
be the leaf on winter’s tree
a sign on your way

item.title: your path can be framed
item.description:
your path can be framed
better plotted in polar
with the deltoid curve

item.title: walking random paths
item.description:
walking random paths
come to hold my hand, farewell
while reflecting sky

item.title: the ease to forget
item.description:
the ease to forget
rotational — reflective
to have them always

item.title: we architect webs
item.description:
we architect webs
it was always here — ready
that it is now time

item.title: I feel this blanket
item.description:
I feel this blanket
as you come to repose — pause
spores of seasons’ growth

item.title: great white fawn lily
item.description:
great white fawn lily
find the space within your mind
into reminders

item.title: do you like to think
item.description:
do you like to think
in the cracks beneath my feet
with the deltoid curve

item.title: I feel this blanket
item.description:
I feel this blanket
in and out of your being
breath in this wildwood

item.title: the moment for tea
item.description:
the moment for tea
ready to coalesce — one
you bring me such joy

item.title: I feel all the strands
item.description:
I feel all the strands
our world —an upside down sphere
with all of your heart

item.title: I found a carcass
item.description:
I found a carcass
cross a bridge from the beneath
then they perch, so still

item.title: you are a symbol
item.description:
you are a symbol
in fall you came, but no more
but, sometimes I break

item.title: it’s best not to see
item.description:
it’s best not to see
just keep going — it is but
now, take in more light

item.title: together we play
item.description:
together we play
at the junction. Sand and sea.
orientation

item.title: in the corner you
item.description:
in the corner you
heavy heads in reverence
that lead to wonder

item.title: our days are fractals
item.description:
our days are fractals
creative, curious, joy
singing of glory

item.title: this junction of ray
item.description:
this junction of ray
will become covered with moss
centuries of flow

item.title: there are just some trails
item.description:
there are just some trails
from an utter nakedness
parametric us

item.title: there exists nothing
item.description:
there exists nothing
rotational — reflective
reaching skyward — up

item.title: in the corner you
item.description:
in the corner you
a palette knife smears serpents
to the stream; ocean

item.title: my luck dragon came
item.description:
my luck dragon came
will become covered with moss
small bubbly fractals

item.title: see generations
item.description:
see generations
cohesion yet separate
drops encompass me

item.title: I have a fixed point
item.description:
I have a fixed point
claim the branch, caw to below
what poems they speak

item.title: He has a paintbrush
item.description:
He has a paintbrush
for the number of poems
detach and then breathe

item.title: in an empty lot
item.description:
in an empty lot
to the heights that we desire
modest are the trees

item.title: here, nested circles
item.description:
here, nested circles
as a Bee is to flower
wispy tufts of grace

item.title: at the tops of hills
item.description:
at the tops of hills
will flip the leaves from my grave
a precious orchid

item.title: a forest burned shows
item.description:
a forest burned shows
cushion your steps as you run
we create in life

item.title: in the sky — a sign
item.description:
in the sky — a sign
your response — absolutely
modest are the trees

item.title: who would have thought that
item.description:
who would have thought that
cedars converge together
hummingbird defense

item.title: sometimes birdwatching
item.description:
sometimes birdwatching
just the other day, grape leaves
don’t go unnoticed

item.title: tiny little life
item.description:
tiny little life
arcs of me, of time — being
of this universe

item.title: sing to the kitties
item.description:
sing to the kitties
for being steadfast, constant
a glow in winter

item.title: butterfly vortex
item.description:
butterfly vortex
lead you to this perspective
we even dilate

item.title: sometimes birdwatching
item.description:
sometimes birdwatching
brings us through our existence
on the azure sky

item.title: the swallows are here
item.description:
the swallows are here
and dip myself in the clouds
days, loops, through the years

item.title: I am so grateful
item.description:
I am so grateful
flutters and swirls before me
whispering of blue

item.title: to feel that soft breeze
item.description:
to feel that soft breeze
lets us forget what it is
contrast is but life

item.title: good morning my friend
item.description:
good morning my friend
found without expectation
shoot; despite ourselves

item.title: my road is the path
item.description:
my road is the path
curve down the spine of our sky
of an inner light

item.title: when I am running
item.description:
when I am running
it was always here — ready
ablutions from sky

item.title: fractal streams draw me
item.description:
fractal streams draw me
in an ocean of currents
violet, green flight

item.title: I think that you might
item.description:
I think that you might
absolutely wonderful
iota of earth

item.title: when you lean into
item.description:
when you lean into
immense, vast, ocean of mist
closer to the light

item.title: baby nuthatches
item.description:
baby nuthatches
hold what is precious and clear
is to leave no trace

item.title: do you ever just
item.description:
do you ever just
that your trail will not be full
Pisano petals

item.title: the sea leaves presents
item.description:
the sea leaves presents
perfect, beautiful flowers
boardwalk to the sky

item.title: a simplicity
item.description:
a simplicity
moonlit branches projected
waiting for sunset

item.title: that forest fragrance
item.description:
that forest fragrance
tiny feet, before you died
within all of this

item.title: I keep company
item.description:
I keep company
hints of orange and purple
remember the sky

item.title: how the light alone
item.description:
how the light alone
strands of kindness, grace, and love
everywhere I go

item.title: now, lessen yourself
item.description:
now, lessen yourself
in the reeds of a refuge
spirals of corners

item.title: crow grabs the sunlight
item.description:
crow grabs the sunlight
it left only a small crack
is a bounty breathed

item.title: messengers of trees
item.description:
messengers of trees
to comfort devastation
and announces life

item.title: the fractals of us
item.description:
the fractals of us
whispered to my deepest self
an umbellifer

item.title: the sea leaves presents
item.description:
the sea leaves presents
lift into the sky above
so that I may flow

item.title: I am now learning
item.description:
I am now learning
accidental flushing dog
a slow dance of white

item.title: splashing in pure joy
item.description:
splashing in pure joy
to each other, back and forth
so we can perceive

item.title: in a full orbit
item.description:
in a full orbit
a trail to be hopped and skipped
to the long light rays

item.title: the lenses we have
item.description:
the lenses we have
reach, spread your canopy
pareidolia

item.title: do you like to think
item.description:
do you like to think
for receding from my path
out of your flower

item.title: and so, here I am
item.description:
and so, here I am
the tiny details abound
finite — infinite

item.title: an aperture formed
item.description:
an aperture formed
hello — I can see you now
to the norms of life

item.title: I breathed alder air
item.description:
I breathed alder air
with youthful minds in my home
the awe of it all
